channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Taylor Swift’s last record made up more than 6% of all album sales in 2024. Will ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ do even better?
item.description: Sales of Swift’s albums drive the fortunes of the entire music industry, as her catalog continues to dominate streaming lists all over the world.

item.title: Former NBA star Zach Randolph sells L.A. trophy estate for $7.4 million, after several price cuts
item.description: Retired Grizzlies star Zach Randolph has finally offloaded his sprawling L.A. home for $7.4 million—11 months after listing it for $8.5 million.
